title.en: In My Death, I Became My Brother's Regret

altTitles.zh: 死后我成了哥哥的朱砂痣

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Hou Wo Chengle Gege De Zhusha Zhi
Sǐ Hòu Wǒ Chéngle Gēgē De Zhūshā Zhì

description.en: The half-demon, Jing Mo, was killed by his older brother Jue Ming when his demonic energy lost control. He found himself in the body of a young man named "Bai Shu", and this body seemed... abnormal. Due to suspicious circumstances revolving around the disappearance of Jing Mo's body, Jue Ming kept an eye on Jing Mo who desperately hid his true identity. With one of them hiding a secret and the other looking for the truth, the pair landed in the middle of a life-or-death struggle that came with being "Bai Shu"...
description.zh: 有着魔修混血的京墨因一次魔气缠身，被哥哥决明杀死，睁眼后却重生到一名叫“白术”的少年身上，而这具身体……并不正常。他隐藏自己是京墨的身份，却被决明以找出弟弟尸身失踪真相为由留在身边。一个要隐藏身份，一个要寻找真相，两人循着“白术”这一身份被卷入一场生死之争中……

title.en: Being a Maid Is Better Than Being a Princess

altTitles.en: A Maid Was More of a Calling Than a Princess
It's Better to Be a Maid Than to Be a Princess

altTitles.es: Mi vocación era ser doncella, no princesa
Ser sirvienta es mejor que una princesa torturada

altTitles.vi: Trở Thành Hầu Nữ Còn Quan Trọng Hơn Là Làm Công Chúa

altTitles.zh: 比起公主，侍女才是我的天职

description.en:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.pt-br: O cara que ela estava interessada não era um cara

altTitles.uk: Хлопець, який її цікавив, взагалі не був хлопцем

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.az: Onun maraqlandığı oğlan əslində heç oğlan deyilmiş

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.id: Pria Yang Dia Suka Ternyata Sama Sekali Bukan Pria

altTitles.th: คนที่เธอปิ๊งความจริงไม่ใช่ผู้ชาย

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
A popular Twitter shorts series depicting the love story between a gyaru and her classmate she mistook as a guy outside of school, bonding over their mutual love for rock music.

---
Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.th: ยอดคนเลเวลทะลุ

altTitles.ja: カンスト突破

description.en:
Dungeons and monsters suddenly appear and the world falls into chaos. Kim Ki-Bong, an ordinary young part-timer, has been sucked up into an awakening dimension for 3000 years to train his powers.

When he makes his return to reality, he is a max-leveled player who only has one wish - to reconcile with his loved ones. 10 years have passed in the real world during his absence.

How will Ki-Bong be able to find his place in the world with his new limit-breaking abilities?

---

description.fr:
Kibong était coincé dans le « test de l’éveil » pendant 3000 ans à cause d’un bug. Enfin libéré du test, le joueur découvre que seulement 10 ans se sont écoulés dans la réalité, et que le monde est devenu un enfer total envahi par les monstres. Avec toutes ses capacités au niveau max, Kibong parviendra-t-il à sauver l’humanité de ces affreuses créatures ?

알 수 없는 오류로 3000년간 각성 테스트에 갇힌 김기봉.
그 사이 현실에선 10년이 흘렀고, 온 세상은 몬스터와 던전으로 가득차게 되었다.
만렙으로 귀환한 김기봉의 모든 것을 원래대로 돌려놓기 위한 싸움이 시작된다!

description.ru:
Ким Ки Бон, молодой парень, оказался в ловушке из-за неизвестных ему обстоятельств. И только через три тысячи лет, он смог "пробудиться". Но в реальности прошло лишь 10 лет, и за это время, весь мир был наводнён разными и ужасными монстрами..
И с этого момента, пробудившийся Ким Ки Бон вступает в битву, чтобы найти ответы на все свои вопросы.

菜鸟三千年升级变最强王者！
怪物肆虐的世界由我来拯救！
林纪锋因游戏Bug被困在觉醒空间3000年，并且被怪兽杀死后还可以无限复活！被迫成为游戏玩家的他，为了重新开始自己的生活，必须与怪兽战斗！但他在觉醒空间的这段时间，地球已过去了10年，整个世界都充满了怪兽...

《CHANGE》作家的新作！金起峰因不明異常被困在覺醒試煉裡3000年，在那期間現實已經過了10年，化為怪物肆虐的末日世界。 滿等重生的金起峰，為了讓一切回歸正常而戰。

description.en: My bias is the City God! It's a story about how a non mainstream boy with unfortunate genetics causes all sorts of trouble in a peaceful city while chasing after the City God... "It doesn't matter if they're a ghost or a monster, nothing can stop my bias Xuming God! Not even the God himself!"

altTitles.ja: 魔王城デート大作戦！

description.en: Kukuru, a princess who wishes to meet her destined one, is taken away to Brosfell Castle and brought before the Demon Lord Diana, who confesses her desire to marry her. Believing that trying to escape on her own would be too dangerous, Kukuru proposes that before getting married, they should go on a date first. With Diana bringing out all the stops while Kukuru secretly looks for a way out, a date taking place in the demon castle begins.

altTitles.ja: 力技のシスター

altTitles.pt-br: A irmã que excela força física

altTitles.es-la: La Hermana con una fuerza brutal

description.en:
The nun who listens to people's confessions and reacts "strongly" to them.
_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2165379) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031114003).
- Alternative Official Raw - [X (Formerly Known as Twitter)](https://twitter.com/man_Arihred/status/1667464395067367424)
description.es-la: La monja que escucha las confesiones de la gente y reacciona "enérgicamente" ante ellas.

altTitles.ja: ノー・ガンズ・ライフ

description.en: After the war, there are many "Extends" in the city, people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them, and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough, his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city, and he is assisted by Mary, an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.
description.uk: Після війни в місті з'явилося багато " Екстендів" - людей, чиї тіла були модифіковані з метою перетворення їх на смертоносну зброю. Джюзо Інуї - один з них, він не має жодних спогадів про своє життя і тіло до того, як його голова перетворилася на пістолет. І як не дивно, але його голова-пістолет влаштована таким чином, що тільки той, хто стоїть позаду нього, може натиснути на спусковий гачок. Джюзо заробляє на життя тим, що займається випадками, пов'язаними з Екстендами по всьому місту, в чому йому допомагає Мері, розумна молода дівчина, котру він взяв під свій захист.
description.pt-br:
Depois da guerra, existiam muitos "Extended" na cidade, que eram pessoas que tiveram os corpos modificados para serem transformados em armas mortais. Inui Juzo é um deles, e ele não possui lembrança alguma da sua vida antes de ter a sua cabeça transformada em uma arma. Estranhamente, a sua arma em formato de revolver é desenhada para que alguém possa puxar o gatilho. Juzo sobrevive solucionando casos envolvendo extended na cidade, e ele é auxiliado pela Mary, uma jovem e inteligente mulher que ele colocou sob a sua proteção.  
  
**Officially Published:**  
- In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/no-guns-life)  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/karasuma2828)  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21978)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23084)

title.en: Guide to Raising a Loyal Dog

description.en: A reward notice for a “lost dog” ties the fates of Ling Xiangwan and Bai Qingxiao together. As the poor university student, Ling Xiangwan, searches for the owner of the dog he is currently carrying, he accidentally catches glimpses of Bai Qingxiao’s naughty deeds. It is only then that he realizes this is not the kind of “dog” the notice was looking for. As the door to flee the scene is quite literally shut, Bai Qingxiao asks Ling Xiangwan to pay him company, how humiliating! Ling Xiangwan leaves, fuming. After that, Bai Qingxiao just can’t seem to get Ling Xiangwan out of his mind…

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?

description.en: Yoosu, whose first love is his childhood neighbor, Chungwoo, gets his feelings discovered by Chungwoo's sister, Jiwoo. Jiwoo proposes to the flustered Yoosu that he become her fake boyfriend so Yoosu is able to see Chungwoo more often. But contrary to his initial hesitance about his feelings for the other, after seeing Chungwoo again for the first time in a long time, Yoosu is greedy to get closer to him...

title.en: The Falsely Exiled Strongest Cursebreaker, The Journey to Revive the Ancient Illusory Kingdom. ~The Cursebreaker King and the Princess of the Abyss~

altTitles.ja-ro: Nureginu de Tsuihousareta Saikyou Kai Noroishi, Maboroshi no Kodai Oukoku wo Saikousasete Musou suru ~Noroiyabu no Ou to Naraku no Hime~

altTitles.ja: 濡れ衣で追放された最強解呪士、幻の古代王国を再興させて無双する～呪破の王と奈落の姫～

description.en:
Alf, one of the kingdom's official cursebreakers, is sentenced and punished to be thrown into the abyss for crimes he did not commit.

Before his very eyes lies a never-ending labyrinth... In this dungeon, that no one has ever escaped from, Alf meets a mysterious beauty!?

The curtains open to the grandiose revenge story of a boy who lost everything after being betrayed by his own kind!!

altTitles.ja: 容疑者Aの花嫁

description.en: The "erotic love suspense" manga centers on Hana, who returns to her family after her husband dies. She lives every day in an oppressive atmosphere, until one day her parents start talking about having a marriage interview for her with a globally renowned artist named Aoi.
description.ja: 夫を亡くし、実家に戻った羽菜。息苦しい毎日を送っていたある日、世界的に有名な画家・蒼井重瑠との見合い話が持ち上がる。今の生活から逃れるために、蒼井との再婚を受け入れた羽菜だけど…彼は、前妻3人を殺した連続殺人事件の容疑者で――！？

description.en:
Back then, it was not only the two of us.
Me, you, and him.

That guy, who always hovered in the periphery of my first love Omega's sight, was an Alpha without pheromones.
The winner of that first love was naturally me, the Alpha with pheromones,
And now, that guy, Seong Jewon, is just another member of our friend group.

I thought our days would continue to pass by peacefully,
But when I got my hands on a candle that can recreate any desired pheromone,
Our relationship began to flow in an unexpected direction.

I thought I was recalling the pheromone of my first love,
But why is it that I remember that guy more clearly?
Can someone tell me why?

“If you press this button, you can enter the world of your own special drama. 
(It will be revealed when you finish the story. If you don’t finish the story, you’ll never know.)

This was posted on my SNS timeline.
It seemed fun, but it was a problem since I had to study for exams.
I quickly pressed it to share with my friend and then fell asleep.

…….I should have just fallen into a deep sleep.

“Cheep.”

What.

“Squawk!”

What the hell! Where am I?

altTitles.ja: ラブ ソー ライフ

altTitles.th: Love So Life เลิฟ โซ ไลฟ์

description.en: Shiharu is a high-school student who loves kids, lives in an orphanage, and works at a daycare… Until the handsome uncle of two-year-old twins offers her a raise if she'll be their babysitter. Often relying on memories of her mother's actions for guidance, Shiharu quickly finds herself falling in love with her new makeshift family.
description.pt-br: Shiharu é uma estudante do ensino médio que ama crianças, vive em um orfanato, e trabalha em uma creche. Sua viva muda quando o tio bonitão de gêmeos de dois anos de idade lhe oferece um emprego de babá, pelo dobro que ela recebe na creche. Contando com lembranças de ações de sua mãe para se orientar na educação e cuidado dos gêmeos, Shiharu rapidamente começa a se apaixonar por sua nova família improvisada.

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ
僕ヤバ

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.ja: ザロックンロールバンド

description.en: Chaos ensues after Take's guitar, which belonged to his late uncle, gets stolen.

The daily life of Lee Jae, a hot-blooded police officer in a quiet rural village, is turned upside down by the reunion with his first love.

Who would have thought that his first love, who had suddenly disappeared without a word one day, would reappear before him as a gangster?

"Just bear with it a little longer. I'm going to do everything that I've been putting off today."

Can he resist that dirty handsome face that he never wanted to see again?

title.en: TS Boys With Unexpectedly Beautiful Girl Moves.

altTitles.ja: 不意に美少女ムーブが出るTS男子

altTitles.ja-ro: Fui ni Bishoujo Move ga Deru TS Danshi

altTitles.en: Genderswapped Boys Who Unexpectedly Do Beautiful Girl Moves

description.en: Sasazuka Kazuharu (16) wakes up on the day of his job interview to find out that he has transformed into a girl.
description.id: Seorang anak lelaki yang bangun di pagi hari dan mendapatinya dirinya telah berubah menjadi seorang gadis pada hari interview kerja paruh waktunya.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: The Splendid Job Of A Monster Maid

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaibutsu Maid no Karei naru Oshigoto

altTitles.fr: Le travail splendide d'une bonne monstrueuse

altTitles.ja: 怪物メイドの華麗なるお仕事

altTitles.en: The Splendid Work of a Monster Maid

description.en:
A demon world maid's cute and spooky fantasy action!  
  
Sumire, a nekomata, who lost her favorite master was wandering around, got lost, and arrived in a foreign country in the demon world?! With the android and undead maids, clean the demon's house brilliantly to take back "that something!"  
  
[Artist's twitter](https://twitter.com/yugata_tanabe)
description.pt-br: Sumire, uma nekomata que após a morte de seu mestre, estava vagando, se perdeu e chegou em um país estrangeiro no mundo dos demônios!? Para recuperar "certa coisa", ela limpará os bagunçados quartos ao lado da morta-viva Rose e a andróide Ivy!

title.en: It’s Time to Change the Genre

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

description.en:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9E%A5%EB%A5%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%B0%94%EA%BF%94%EB%B3%B4%EB%8F%84%EB%A1%9D-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2494)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/I-Will-Change-the-Genre/3487)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74301)

altTitles.ja: 平良深姉妹はどっちもヤんでる

altTitles.ja-ro: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu

altTitles.en: The Yandere Little Sister and the Menhera Big Sister

altTitles.es-la: La hermana pequeña Yandere y la hermana mayor Menhera

altTitles.zh: 平良深姐妹都“病”得不轻

altTitles.vi: Hai chị em nhà Herami bất ổn thực sự!

description.en: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid cafe. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever think of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety
description.ja: せーら（本名：平良深 瀬良）はメイドカフェで働く承認欲求高めな女子（26歳）。そんな彼女の妹・キラは、クールな大人っぽいキャラで人気沸騰中のアイドル（19歳）。しかし、素顔のキラはいつも姉のことしか考えておらず、不安を抱える姉のため、あらゆる手段で励まそうとしていて…。
description.es-la: Sera, (Nombre real: Herami Sera) es una chica que busca aprobación (26 años) que trabaja en un maid café. Su hermana menor, Kira, es una ídolo (19 años) que está ganando popularidad rápidamente con su carácter frío y maduro. Sin embargo, la verdadera Kira solo piensa en su hermana y trata de animarla de todas las maneras posibles para ayudar a su hermana con su salud mental y ansiedad.

altTitles.ja: 不揃いの連理

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

altTitles.ja: 不揃いの連理

description.en:
Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?  
  
- [Part 1 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1030773596430327808)
- [Part 2 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1044057437831979008)
- [Part 3 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1065586182698889216)

title.en: Henkyou no Yakushi, Miyako de S Rank Boukensha to naru

altTitles.en: The Healer Ditches the Boonies to Become an S-Rank Adventurer: The Boy from the Hero’s Village Doesn’t Know His Cheat Medicine Is Unrivaled

altTitles.ja: 辺境の薬師、都でＳランク冒険者となる～英雄村の少年がチート薬で無自覚無双～

description.en: Leaf has been enjoying a peaceful life in his village at the farthest end of the country, but everything gets turned upside down when his fiancée betrays him, robbing him of his home, work, and everything he cherishes. Wandering around, lost on what to do next, he encounters a distinguished lady in peril who will change his life forever! Using the cheat-like power of medicine and drugs the world scoffs at, Leaf now begins his journey to become the almighty healer! "
description.id: Leaf telah menikmati kehidupan yang damai di desanya di ujung terjauh negara itu, tetapi segalanya menjadi terbalik ketika tunangannya mengkhianatinya, merampok rumah, pekerjaan, dan semua yang dia hargai. Berkeliaran, bingung apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya, dia bertemu dengan seorang wanita terkemuka dalam bahaya yang akan mengubah hidupnya selamanya! Menggunakan kekuatan pengobatan dan obat-obatan yang dicemooh dunia, Leaf kini memulai perjalanannya untuk menjadi penyembuh yang maha kuasa! "
description.ja:
田舎者の少年・リーフが最強の“調薬”スキルで成り上がる！　人生を変える出会いが都会にはいっぱい！！　無自覚無双な痛快“調薬”ファンタジーがここに開幕！！

最強の“調薬”スキルで成り上がれ！！　田舎に住む少年・リーフは、ある日許嫁に裏切られ、すべてを失ってしまう。しかし、大貴族のお嬢様・プリシラと出会ったことでリーフの人生は激変！　「薬を作れるだけなはず」の少年が、世界最強の冒険者になっていく！！

title.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks

altTitles.zh: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

altTitles.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

altTitles.vi: Vợ ơi, xin hãy ngoan nhé!

description.en:
This is brought to you by the same author of "My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago". 

"If you could go back in time, what would you do?"

"I would go to the school entrance and wait for you every day to pursue you shamelessly until you're my girlfriend. What about you?"

"Hmm... I will definitely carefully wait until I'm twenty-four to get to know you again, then gradually fall in love, then get married, and then ask you this question. I live cautiously because I'm afraid that the butterfly effect will make me lose you."

title.en: The Day I Stopped Being Best Buddies with a Female Skater

altTitles.ja: スケーター女子とマブダチじゃなくなる日

altTitles.ja-ro: Skater Joshi to Mabudachi ja Nakunaru Hi

altTitles.ja: 俺は大魔導士だ！

description.en:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.fr:
La planète a été envahie par des monstres, que seuls les sorciers peuvent chasser. Notre héros, simple humain, n'a pas vraiment d'autre choix que de jouer le rôle d’appât dans les chasses s’il veut un salaire décent. Mais un jour, blessé par une de ces créatures et sur le point de mourir, il se rappelle sa vie antérieure… en tant que roi des sorciers, rien que ça ! Armé de ses souvenirs et de ses nouveaux pouvoirs, sa vie devrait vite devenir intéressante.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ja:
10年前、次元が拗れてモンスターが溢れ出た。 同時に生まれたモンスター覚醒者たちは→モンスターを捕まえて大活躍をする。 「吉澤覚」は月に4回、お母さんの病院代を工面するために 覚醒者のハンティングを手伝って、 後処理をする危険千万の「ポーター」として活動をする。 そんな中でモンスターに大きな怪我を負ってから前世の記憶が戻ってくる… ”ん？俺死んだのか？” ”俺は前世に大魔導士のクラトゥラスだったじゃん！！” 前世の記憶を持った「吉澤覚」のパワハラ魔法が始まる！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ko:
10년 전, 차원이 비틀리며 몬스터가 쏟아져 나왔다.
동시에 생겨난 초능력 각성자들이 몬스터를 잡으며 대세가 되는데...

성훈은 한 달에 네 번, 어머니의 병원비를 마련하기 위해
각성자의 사냥을 돕고, 뒤처리하는 위험천만한 '짐꾼'으로 활동한다.

그러던 중 몬스터에게 큰 부상을 입고 전생을 기억하게 되는데...

"어라, 나 죽었나?"

"나 전생에 대마도사 크라투라스였잖아!!!"

전생의 기억을 가진 성훈의 갑질 마법이 시작된다!!

*********************
판타지 화제작 데카스펠 작가님의 <나는 마도왕이다> 본격 웹툰화!
세계를 휩쓰는 마도왕의 마법을 웹툰으로 만나 보세요!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ru:
10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун, нуждающийся в деньгах из-за болезни своей матери, берёт опасную работу, помогая охотиться на этих монстров четыре раза в месяц в качестве приманки. Но однажды, оказавшись тяжело раненным, он вспомнит свою прошлую жизнь.  
«Я что, только что умер? Погоди-ка, я был королём-волшебником Кратра в прошлой жизни?!»

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.pt-br:
10 anos atrás, a horda de monstros da fenda formada da distorção do tempo e espaço iniciaram um ataque contra a humanidade. Ao mesmo tempo que, as pessoas começaram a despertar poderes e iniciaram uma caçada aos monstros em busca de fama e dinheiro. Lee SungHoon, à procura de dinheiro devido à doença de sua mãe, arruma um trabalho altamente perigoso, ajudando na caçada desses monstros bancando a isca para os caçadores, fazendo isso quatro vezes no mês. Mas, um dia, ele é gravemente ferido por um monstro e relembra de sua vida passada como o Rei dos Feiticeiros. "Hã? Eu acabei de morrer? Espera aí, eu era O Rei dos Feiticeiros Kuratauras na minha vida passada?" Com as memórias de sua vida anterior, o espetáculo do poder mágico esmagador de SungHoon se inicia.   

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)

description.en:
A senior disciple from a countryside martial academy returns as the world’s best! Dragged into a brutal political war, senior disciple ‘Hyeok Musang’ didn’t return after the bloody war ended. No one knew whether he was still alive for 5 years.

Upon barely returning to his hometown, he found his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy being persecuted and destroyed by a third-rate gang.

He thought he could live peacefully with his fellow members after winning the war but seeing the miserable state of his master and fellow disciples, he was filled with anger and guilt.

With the return of the senior disciple, everyone thought things would get better but only for a moment. Things were still happening in his hometown of Yangzhou County. Was the war really over? The head disciple raises his sword against the dangers threatening his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy.

title.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

altTitles.ja: 俺だけが呪文使い

description.en:
The world is under threat from interdimensional monsters, and only the chosen Awakened - humans possessed of special powers - can defeat them!

Sure, it sounds exciting, but it’s a far cry from reality for ordinary office worker Park Dohyeok, who’s more worried about landing a big business deal that could save his job. That is, until one day when Dohyeok’s path crosses a monster outbreak, causing him to manifest his true powers as a rare and powerful form of Awakened!

With his newfound abilities attracting eager allies and powerful enemies, will Dohyeok find that he has what it takes to survive?
description.it: Il mondo è minacciato da mostri interdimensionali e solo i prescelti "Risvegliati" - esseri umani dotati di poteri speciali - possono sconfiggerli! Certo, sembra eccitante, ma è molto lontano dalla realtà per il normale impiegato Dohyeok Park, che è più preoccupato di concludere un grosso affare che potrebbe salvargli il posto di lavoro. Questo fino a quando, un giorno, la strada di Dohyeok si incrocia con un'epidemia di mostri che gli fa manifestare i suoi veri poteri come una rara e potente forma di Risvegliato. Con le sue nuove capacità che attirano alleati desiderosi e potenti nemici, Dohyeok scoprirà di avere ciò che serve per sopravvivere?
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマンとして日々を送っていた白虎到（はくと いたる）。 絶体絶命の危機に晒された瞬間、あれほど望んでいた覚醒者に！ しかも、２０代全てをゲームに注いだあの時の記憶と経験が覚醒の能力になるとは！！！ さらに、なんと10億分の1の確率と言われている「トリプル覚醒者」に！ 世界の頂点（トップ）を目指す呪文使い「白虎到」の奇想天外の活躍ストーリーが今、始まります。

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ko:
평범한 샐러리맨으로 살아가는 박도혁,
절체절명의 위기에 빠진 순간 그토록 원하던 각성자가 되었다!
그것도 20대 인생을 바친 게임의 기억과 경험이 내 각성 능력이 되다니!!!

더구나, 10억분의 1인 확률이라는
“무려 트리플 각성자! "

세계 최고의 정점을 노리는
주문 사용자 박도혁의 기상천외한 활약기가 지금 바로 시작됩니다.

****************
청초작가님의 인기 웹소설 본격 웹툰화

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ru:
"Было бы здорово, если бы я смог использовать все эти способности в жизни!"
Я думал, что исполнить это желание не под силу даже Богу, но в момент смертельной опасности, похоже он услышал меня.
Самое время сыграть в реальность!
Да, теперь я единственный, кто использует заклинания!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)

description.en: The special discipleship of Moorim's best assassin, "Gwi-Myeon-Dok," will begin.
description.tr: Murim’in en iyi suikastçisi, Gwi-Myeon-Dok’un müritinin özel eğitimi başlıyor.

altTitles.ja: サチ録　～サチの黙示録～

description.en: ‘Humanity’s Judgment’ — a process by which an angel and a demon meticulously pass judgment upon a human, and the final score determines the fate of mankind. But this time, the chosen subject is the incredibly mischievous 6-year-old elementary school student, Sachi Ueno?! Just how will the unconventional living arrangement of an angel, a demon, and a human shape the future of humanity?

altTitles.en: Grandpa Samurai and Granddaughter of the Supreme

description.en: Just when Liu Jinshan thought he could die without regrets, his family was annihilated! As a result, he became determined to live just so that he could see his only surviving granddaughter, Liu Seol, reach adulthood. As he struggled to raise her and train her with his aging body, Liu Seol, who was born with the talent of a supreme martial artist, grew up much faster than he thought she would. "Don't worry, Grandpa, I'll protect you from now on!"

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

When I woke up, I discovered I had become the villain in the martial arts novel I wrote! But of all people, why does the body I possess belong to a damn villain?

Hyuk Ryun Woon:
The fourth son of the Demonic Cult’s Leader
A nasty womanizer
A martial arts weakling with a filthy temper
A worthless villain who is one shotted by the main character in the novel!

If I don’t want to be killed by the main character, I have no choice but to become strong.
“Fucking hell. The main character and whatnot, I’ll wipe them all out!”
The Shaking Tale of a distasteful villain who uses whatever means necessary to survive!

title.en: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to

altTitles.ja: エルフとバイクと帝国地理調査員と

altTitles.en: Elf and Bike and Imperial Geographic Surveyor and...

description.en: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ
description.ja: 帝国地理院の調査員の助手をしているエルフのノノアはバイクを駆り、相棒のカゴ―と2人で大きく変わってしまった、魑魅魍魎が跋扈する地方の街道沿いを調査。地図を更新する仕事をしていた。休息がてら泉で水浴びするノノアだが、その前に現われたのは…!?

description.fr:
Wooju est obsédé par la fortune et les superstitions. Dojin est un psychiatre qui s'avère être gay mais qui reste dans le placard (il n'a pas fait son coming-out). Alors que Dojin a un rendez-vous arrangé avec la grande sœur de Wooju, elle comprend immédiatement la situation et propose un marché avec Dojin. Elle maintiendra sa ruse pour garder la mère de Dojin heureuse en échange de l'aide de Dojin pour traiter la pathologie de Wooju.
Dojin serait-il le porte-bonheur dont Wooju a besoin...?

description.en: In a zombie apocalypse, a woman relentlessly fights for the search for new clothes so fiercely that the zombies begin to organize for better living conditions, on the other hand, a zombie with a high level of cooking wisely chooses its prey, demanding the seal. friboi, and as fate would have it, these two end up becoming lovers.
description.pt-br: Em um apocalipse zumbi, uma mulher luta implacavelmente pela busca por novas roupas de maneira tão feroz que os zumbies começam a se organizar por melhores condições de vida, em contra partida, um zumbi com alto nível de culinária escolhe sabiamente suas presas, exigindo o selo friboi, e por zueira do destino, esses dois acabam se tornando namorados.

altTitles.ja: セーフセックス

description.en: Ai and Yuu went to buy condoms in "Safe Sex". The time goes back a little to their first encounter! A new type of everyday romantic comedy that only adults can understand.
description.ja: ある日、居酒屋で出会った優くんと愛ちゃん。はじめましてだけど、イイ感じになった2人はワンナイト…ではなく、どうなる？

title.en: The Gardener in a Hunter World

description.en:
Ji-ha, the weakest labor-class hunter with neither skill nor fighting ability, made a living by running a store while holding the lowest hunter rank.

But one day, his life as a hunter changed when he entered a garden from a different dimension through his dream...

<You have obtained Friendly Plant Lv.1> <You have obtained Blessing of XXX Lv.1>

'I gained a skill just by planting one twig...?'

His unique adventure as the sole gardener in the hunter world begins.

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi-san, Saikyou no Dungeon wo Tsukurimasen ka?

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師さん、最強のダンジョンを創りませんか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi-san, Saikyou no Danjon o Tsukurimasen ka?

altTitles.en: Do you want to create the strongest dungeon, Mr. Alchemist who was expelled?
Exiled Alchemist, Why Not Create the Strongest Dungeon?

description.en: Rick, an alchemist who was banished from the strongest heroes' party, is wandering the wilds alone, when he saves a beautiful woman. It turns out that she is a dungeon spirit! Rick makes a contract with her and becomes the dungeon master. Now he is determined to create a dungeon that will defeat all the heroes!

altTitles.en: How to Live as a Fake Healer

altTitles.th: ฮีลเลอร์กำมะลอ

description.en:
One day, Seunghyeon Kang woke up to find himself in an unfamiliar world, on the continent of Azeul. At that moment, a status window pops up: 

[Your class is Healer?]

Wait, but he doesn’t have a single healing skill?! 

And so begins the life of a quack Healer who can’t cast Heal as he struggles to find a way back to his home!
Yan Shuangshuang watched her former lover die before her eyes. An angel appeared, giving her a chance to live again. However, after her rebirth, everything went wrong.
